Daily Supporting tagline

-学习spec 使用和测试方法 -一些常用命令 ack-grep等

require 'spec_helper'

class Person
  attr_accessor :name

  @@name = "Allen"
  @xxxxx = "Smith"

  def self.foo
    puts @xxxxx.object_id
  end

  def bar
    puts @xxxxx.object_id
  end

  def name
    @name=
    @@name
  end

  def name=(name)
    @@name = name
  end
end

Person.foo

Person.new.bar
#the @xxxxx in Person is different of  @xxxxx in Person.new
